ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Newbie project stats
ygData.msgSnippet: You can, and many people do.  You will need to score an invis-undead from a friendly necro, sk, pally or cleric (or even enchanter) to get down there though.
ygData.messageBody:
You can, and many people do. You will need to score an invis-undead from a
friendly necro, sk, pally or cleric (or even enchanter) to get down there
though. Undead see invis.

G'luck! And remember: Don't go through the spiderwebs, and when you go by
the GIBS hug the right wall so they don't aggro on you (Gibs see through
invis-undead sometimes).


----- Original Message -----
From: "Scott Malin" <Thanos0000@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 9:48 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Newbie project stats


> > Easy, if you have been a good boy and not killed any froggies...OR have
> > killed a few and have Cinda's, OR have invis.
> >
> > Gauntlets drop at both the live side and dead side zone and are no drop
> > (grieves only at the Dead side). I think it is easier to get them at the
> > live side, just dance right in (bring muffins, milk and bandages in case
> the
> > group you are going to be a parasite upon needs em) and ask nicely if
you
> > might loot the gauntlets if they don't need or can't use them. On both
> > servers I got them within minutes of arriving.
>
> Nope, no live-side issues. Took a swipe at a single froggie that attacked
> our cleric, he ran and didn't die while I was in the zone.
>
> How about this in the leaching catagory. The mask of deception, my
> understanding is that this rots a lot on most servers. I also see a lot of
> lower level bards with one. When I have 19th level invis song is it
possible
> to get to the Assissin room (provided it's camped) and wait patiently and
> politly for one to drop?
>
>
